effect.x-y: If the user has a major status effect and the target does not, the user’s status is transferred to the target.
effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: If the user has a major status effect and the target does not, the user’s status is transferred to the target.

short_effect.x-y: Transfers the user’s major status effect to the target.
short_effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Transfers the user’s major status effect to the target.

flavor_text.x-y: Using its psychic power of suggestion, the user transfers its status conditions to the target.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Using its psychic power of suggestion, the user transfers its status conditions to the target.
